summary: Assign class labels to a datacube
description: This function assigns class labels to the provided dataset based on a machine learning model or rule-based classification. The labeled data can be used for further analysis or modeling.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The datacube to which class labels will be assigned.

returns.description: A datacube with assigned class labels. The result includes the original dataset with an additional dimension or attribute representing the predicted class labels.

dimensions.description: Class labels assigned to the data
